page.title: 06LIMERIGG RELIGION 2
page.content: This led to the withdrawal of a full-time missionary around the beginning of this century. Slamannan Parish minister then assumed full responsibility and this remains the situation at the moment. On 30th December,1951 the old church building was virtually destroyed during the height of a gale. The Rev.Alexander Cameron,M.A. with the help of the local miners rebuilt the present building. During the mid-seventies more renovation work was carried out and the overall decoration of the building improved. Throughout its 100 year existance the mission church has witnessed great changes. From the halcyon days of the mining industry right through to the present days of depression. The local community guard jealously their inheritance.
